price: 1. Tamah Yallaa kee kay farmoytak Yallat agleytit haa maray isin xagana kah culteenik xagni gacsih maysaxxaga kinni mominiiney.
arabic: بَرَآءَةٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ عَٰهَدتُّم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: barāatun mina al-lahi warasūlihi ilā alladhīna ʿāhadttum mina al-mush'rikīna
